column2: an A.M. Eatery////On the other hand
column3: I have a couple of complaints. When we we're waiting for our food
column4: a dog came up and started licking me. I was so grossed out because I don't like dogs. Then once I was in the restaurant
column5: our waiter started giving the dog food and petting it. I don't know if she washed her hands
column6: but I do know that I was feeling uncomfortable. When a couple of kids starting playing catch on the other side of the fence
column7: the dog stated barking like crazy. Here's me trying to enjoy my meal
column8: and here's a dog barking way too loud. I don't want any dog germs on the food that I'm eating and I want to enjoy my meal(without barking). They shouldn't allow pets at a restaurant or any restaurant because it's incredibly gross.
